document_data.name: Yhliivast
document_data.mainbody: The '''Yhliivast''' family was a [[human]] mercantile family of [[Amnwater]] in [[Amn]].
document_data.Activities: The Yhliivasts concerned themselves mainly with caravan-related trades and businesses in Amnwater, including [[horse]] breeding, horse training, wheelwrights, and the [[Gilded Spur]], a luxury inn that gathered coins and information from caravaneers. Together with the [[Ironseth]] and [[Wheelarit]] families, they had gained near complete control over Amnwater by about [[1320 DR]], with the Yhliivasts the wealthiest and most powerful of the trio.{{cite book/Lands of Intrigue/Amn|14}}
document_data.Members:
* Lord [[Jhanos Yhliivast]], the fearsome family patriarch in [[1370 DR]].
* [[Krigar]], the lover of Lord Jhanos.
